name: Californium
description: PUGG--Play Unity Gold Game PUGG, as the starting point of the Metaverse, will disrupt civic, social, gaming, and multiple industries with an open cooperative ecology and scenario extension. Real business consumption scenarios will create an immersive experience, and a Play-to-Earn (P2E) model to earn while playing. PUGG uses a revolutionary pass economy system that nicely combines the advantages of DeFi and NFTs, using financial mechanisms and gaming systems to empower players and create a truly unique and lasting free-to-play, easy-to-earn ecosystem.
